resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108349</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108349</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770211183</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Mosquito Bytes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Moskito-Bytes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Octets de Moustique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Bytes Do Mosquito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Byte Della Zanzara</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οκτάδες κουνουπιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Octetos Del Mosquito</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">As disease-infected mosquitoes expand their range, these bugs rise higher on the "menace to human health" list. What makes mosquitoes so perfect for disease transfer? Is global warming a factor? How is modern technology being harnessed to combat skeeters? National standards included for grades 5-12. Teacher resource page at http://whyfiles.org/teachers/016skeeter/.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Da Krankheit-angesteckte Moskitos ihre Strecke 
erweitern, steigen diese Programmfehler stark auf die "Drohung zur 
menschlichen Gesundheit" Liste. Was bildet Moskitos also 
vollkommen für Krankheitübertragung? Ist global, einen Faktor 
wärmend? Wie wird moderne Technologie vorgespannt, um skeeters 
zu bekämpfen? Nationale Standards eingeschlossen für Grade 
5-12. Lehrerhilfsmittelseite an 
http://whyfiles.org/teachers/016skeeter/.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Car les moustiques maladie-infectés augmentent 
leur intervalle, ces anomalies montent plus haut sur "menace la liste 
à santé humaine". Que fait des moustiques si parfait pour le 
transfert de la maladie ? Est global chauffant un facteur ? 
Comment la technologie moderne est-elle armée pour combattre 
des skeeters ? Normes nationales incluses pour des catégories 
5-12. Page de ressource de professeur à 
http://whyfiles.org/teachers/016skeeter/.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Porque os mosquitos doença-disease-infected 
expandem sua escala, estes erros levantam-se mais altamente "ameaça 
na lista à saúde humana". Que faz mosquitos assim que perfeito
para transferência da doença? É global aquecendo um fator? 
Como a tecnologia moderna está sendo aproveitarada para 
combater skeeters? Padrões nacionais incluídos para classes 
5-12. Página do recurso do professor em 
http://whyfiles.org/teachers/016skeeter/.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Poichè le zanzare malattia-infettate espandono la
loro gamma, questi insetti aumentano più su "minaccia sulla lista a 
salute umana". Che cosa fa le zanzare così perfetto per il 
trasferimento di malattia? È globale scaldando un fattore? 
Come la tecnologia moderna sta sfruttanda per combattere gli 
skeeters? Standard nazionali inclusi per i gradi 5-12. 
Pagina delle risorse dell'insegnante a 
http://whyfiles.org/teachers/016skeeter/.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Όπως ασθένεια-μολύνεται τα κουνούπια επεκτείνουν τη 
σειρά τους, άνοδος αυτών των προγραμματιστικών λαθών υψηλότερη 
στον κατάλογο "απειλής στην ανθρώπινη υγεία". Αυτό που 
καθιστά τα κουνούπια τόσο τέλεια για τη μεταφορά ασθενειών; 
Είναι σφαιρικός θερμαίνοντας έναν παράγοντα; Πώς 
είναι η σύγχρονη τεχνολογία που χρησιμοποιείται στα skeeters 
αγώνα; Εθνικά πρότυπα που περιλαμβάνονται για τους βαθμούς 
5-12, τη σελίδα των στοιχείων συμπεριφοράς δασκάλων σε 
http://whyfiles.org/teachers/016skeeter/.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pues los mosquitos enfermedad-infectados amplían 
su rango, estos fallos de funcionamiento se levantan más arriba en 
"amenaza la lista de la salud humana". ¿Qué hace mosquitos así
que perfecto para la transferencia de la enfermedad? ¿Es global 
calentando un factor? ¿Cómo la tecnología moderna se está 
enjaezando para combatir skeeters? Estándares nacionales 
incluidos para los grados 5-12. Paginación del recurso del 
profesor en http://whyfiles.org/teachers/016skeeter/.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770211183</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108349</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
